description: Try our easy to follow Breakfast Slice recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Slice,Seafood free,Tree nut free,Healthier Easier,Low sugar,Back to school,Sesame free,Stone fruit,Banana,High fibre,Soy free,Sweet potato,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Breakfast Slice Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 0.33 cup desiccated coconut (plus 1 tsp extra for sprinkling)
0.25 cup chia seeds (plus 1 tsp extra for sprinkling)

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 180Â°C and line a 20x30cm slice pan with baking paper.
Mash bananas in a large bowl. Add olive oil and eggs, and mix well to combine.
In a separate bowl stir cinnamon, oats, baking powder, flour, coconut and chia seeds to combine. Add to banana mixture with apricot and sweet potato, and stir until just combined.

HowToTip.tipText: Tip: Serve with low-fat Greek yogurt and fruit.

recipeInstructions.text: Tip mixture into pan and spread evenly. Sprinkle with extra coconut and chia seeds. Bake for 30 minutes or until a skewer withdraws clean when pierced in the centre. Set aside to cool briefly in pan, then cut into slices.
